entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
